prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a youthful East-Asian man, short spiky black hair, earnest and determined expression, wearing **silver metallic shoulder armor, a matching chestplate, and dark purple leather-like fabric for the torso and leggings**
feature_prompt: hyper-realistic skin texture, subtle sweat, realistic metallic specular highlights on armor, textured leather undergarment, sharp focus on armor details
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, flat lighting, low quality, blurry face, helmet-like hair, muscular bodybuilder, no armor, plain clothes
